import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductService } from 'src/app/service/product.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product', templateUrl: './product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product.component.css'] }) export class ProductComponent implements OnInit{ product: Array = []; constructor(private productService: ProductService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.productService.getProductAll().subscribe(data => { this.product = data; }) } }
